thread.section_title: Spotahome opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Spotahome | www.spotahome.com | 2 de 20
thread.title: Julia Melymbrose

author: Julia Melymbrose
title: Julia Melymbrose
text: The Spotahome webiste is great, easy to use and has a great variety of homes to choose from. The videos from the Spotahome people are particularly helpful as they help you understand what a space is like far better than any pictures. I've used their live chat a couple of times before booking with questions I had and they've always been prompt and helpful. the booking process was fast and easy and the spotahome team has been very professional and friendly. Overall a great experience!
